data.text: RT @sarbanandsonwal: Here's some moments while flagging-off Nok Air's Guwahati-Bangkok direct flight from LGBI Airport. https://t.co/j7Ase6…

Nok Air is delighted to introduce our direct flight between Guwahati to Bangkok with our twice a week Service starting from 22nd September, 2019.
To Know More: https://t.co/wsv5168GeP
.
.
#StartsWithNokAir #WeFlySmiles #CountdownBegins https://t.co/G71o1Yzgco

Fly at ease to the most visited city in the world from Guwahati with Nok Air's new Twice a week direct flight that begins operations from 22nd September, 2019 onwards! To Know More: https://t.co/wsv5168GeP
.
.
#StartsWithNokAir #WeFlySmiles #CountdownBegins https://t.co/sjqxpf76C5

Nok Air’s non-stop service between Guwahati to Bangkok is just 3 days away. So, get ready to fly non-stop from Guwahati to Bangkok with our twice a week flight! To Know More: https://t.co/wsv5168GeP
.
.
#StartsWithNokAir #WeFlySmiles #CountdownBegins https://t.co/FX7ijQ2vOQ

You’ve got all the good reasons to get excited. Only 4 days left to our inaugural flight starting from 22nd September, 2019 between Guwahati to Bangkok. To Know More: https://t.co/wsv515R5nh
.
.
#StartsWithNokAir #WeFlySmiles #CountdownBegins https://t.co/r1A3TUmp7c

The most-awaited day is approaching near. 
A new experience is about to begin from 22nd September, 2019. We will be in your City Guwahati in 05 days.
.
.
#StartsWithNokAir #WeFlySmiles #CountdownBegins https://t.co/yeQxdkUoti

The countdown to our inaugural flight starting from 22nd September, 2019 officially begins. 
So, get ready to fly non-stop from Guwahati to Bangkok with our twice a week flight.
.
.
#StartsWithNokAir #WeFlySmiles #CountdownBegins #Nokair https://t.co/HkdaruAB2N
